articles.author: Helen Albert
articles.title: Slowing Bacterial Evolution Could Help Reduce Antibiotic Resistance - Inside Precision Medicine
articles.description: Dequalinium chloride is able to stop Escherichia coli bacteria from evolving when exposed to antibiotics such as ciprofloxacin.
articles.content:
Research led by Baylor College of Medicine shows slowing bacterial evolution using dequalinium chloride could be an alternative route to combating the ongoing problem of antibiotic resistance.
